function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Accumulating approach to highlighting risky zones in covered areas with poor ventilation","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread in poorly ventilated areas","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation systems, implement air filtration, and promote social distancing measures","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems, ventilation monitoring systems","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces with poor ventilation","Owner":"Building management, facility managers, HVAC professionals"},{"Description":"Inaccurate risk assessment due to varying contamination trends in different areas","Impact":"Misidentification of safe and risky zones, leading to ineffective containment measures","Mitigation":"Conduct detailed airflow and contamination analysis, consider individual exposure times, and implement real-time monitoring","Technologies":"Contamination modeling software, real-time air quality sensors, ventilation simulation tools","People":"Occupants and visitors in different areas of the built environment","Owner":"Building management, facility managers, air quality engineers"},{"Description":"Inadequate long-term monitoring of crowd behavior and contamination trends","Impact":"Failure to identify and address changing risk factors over time, leading to persistent contamination hotspots","Mitigation":"Implement continuous monitoring systems, analyze historical data, and adjust mitigation strategies based on trends","Technologies":"Crowd behavior tracking software, historical data analysis tools, real-time monitoring systems","People":"Occupants, visitors, and the general public in shared built environments","Owner":"Building management, facility managers, data analysts"}]}
